data.title: William Ewart Gladstone Collection: Finding Aid
data.text:
[Gladstone, W.E. (William Ewart), 1809-1898]. “Arrangements for [funeral of Sir Stephen Glynne], Wednesday June 24, 1874…,” A.MS. (6 p.), (1874, June 22), [Hawarden]. GLA 2

Note: Very fragile -- handle carefully.

Gladstone, W.E. (William Ewart), 1809-1898. [Check for £25 paid to the order of Harry Drew, d. 1910], D.S. (printed: 1 p.), (1890, June 3). GLA 3

On verso: endorsed by Harry Drew.

Note: copied out by William Henry Gladstone (?).

Cataloger’s note: printed petition signed by a large number of M.P.s.
